name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chinese Grammar Wiki Anki and Progress Helper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extensions help you export example sentences (for Anki etc) and mark what grammar points you have studied

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension that will help you export example sentences and mark your progress when studying on https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar
The extension lets you mark which grammar points you are "done" with.
When you study a grammar point, there are a lot of useful example sentences, and with the "Add" button you can add them to a temporary list that you later can export in a CSV format with a click, which you could use to import cards to Anki or any other tool you use.

This is mainly developed for personal use, but I believe this could be helpful for other people so I decided to make it public. Feel free to use it if you like.

Important: Your progress and list will be erased if you uninstall the extension.
